com.amazon.device.messaging

Class ADMConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants

  • public final class ADMConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains error strings and special key strings passed with ADM messages.
    Since:
    {public final class com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMConstants {}

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ADMConstants.LowLevel
      This class provides constants that are used only if you are crafting intents manually.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ERROR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
      Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when an authentication failure occurs.
      static java.lang.String ERROR_INVALID_SENDER
      Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when the ADM service did not recognize your API Key.
      static java.lang.String ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE
      Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when the ADM service is unavailable.
      static java.lang.String EXTRA_MD5
      An extra in the Intent provided to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onMessage(android.content.Intent) containing the MD5 hash of the message payload.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ERROR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED

        public static final java.lang.String ERROR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
        Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when an authentication failure occurs. The user may need to re-register their device with Amazon.
        Since:
        {public static final java.lang.String ERROR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED;}
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE

        public static final java.lang.String ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE
        Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when the ADM service is unavailable. If you are using ADMMessageHandlerBase to receive your messages, you should not retry, as it has already done so.
        Since:
        {public static final java.lang.String ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_AVAILABLE;}
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_INVALID_SENDER

        public static final java.lang.String ERROR_INVALID_SENDER
        Passed to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onRegistrationError(String) when the ADM service did not recognize your API Key. Confirm that your API Key is embedded in your APK, according to these instructions and that you have successfully obtained valid ADM credentials.
        Since:
        {public static final java.lang.String ERROR_INVALID_SENDER;}
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_MD5

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_MD5
        An extra in the Intent provided to ADMMessageHandlerBase.onMessage(android.content.Intent) containing the MD5 hash of the message payload.
        Since:
        {public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_MD5;}
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
